p: M. longifolia fresh leaves were harvested from Jelma Sidi Bouzid (Tunisia, latitude 35.36° and longitude 9.38°). Plant samples were collected twice: during spring (April-May) and winter at the full ripening (October-November). The plant specimen was authenticated by Professor Mohamed Chaieb, and a voucher sample was kept at the Biopesticides Laboratory Herbarium of the Centre of Biotechnology of Sfax under the code number LBPes 04.
